A cup of hot water is created by using a bowl of hot water on an empty tea cup. It is solely used to make a Guthix rest potion. It is not drinkable like tea is, and it can do nothing by itself.

A '''cup of hot water''' is created by using a [[bowl of hot water]] on an [[empty cup|empty tea cup]]. It is solely used to make a [[Guthix rest]] potion. It is not drinkable like tea is, and it can do nothing by itself.
